title: Israeli Researchers Use mRNA Based Vaccine Against Plague

opengraph.description:
Israel used and scrutinized the mRNA Covid  vaccine to combat the pandemic. The Mediterranean country has a reputation for acquiring technology and then using it for their own purposes. Now it appears the Israelis have done it again, adapting mRNA for other vaccines. They are still in the early stages but looking at an mRNA vaccine targeting the plague,
Adapted for Bacterial Pathogens
